## sendRawTransaction

sendRawTransaction {sign_raw_tx} {allow_high_fee}; allow_high_fee: default false; send sing_raw_tx to network

### Usage

```
qitmeer-cli sendRawTransaction [flags]
```



### Alias

- sendrawtransaction

- SendRawTransaction

- sendRawTx

- sendrawtx

- SendRawTx

### Examples

```

sendRawTransaction 

sendRawTransaction  true
	
```

### Options

```
  -h, --help   help for sendRawTransaction
```
